text:
.@PressSec: "The president is OK with mail-in voting so long as you have a reason."

Here's a reason for you: People are terrified of being infected by a virus that has killed more than 100,000 Americans—many of whom are dead because of Trump's failed coronavirus response. https://t.co/QVqnNMBiX5
